displaytitle: Near Chambers Creek Looking toward West Point
medium: Pen and black ink with traces of graphite
creditline: Gift of Leonard L. Milberg, Class of 1953 in honor of John Wilmerding, Christopher B. Sarofim, '86 Professor of American Art Princeton University
inscribed:
in black ink, upper center: From near Chambers' creek | looking towards | West Point
in black ink, lower right: 1, Sept. 1796.-
